item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 域自适应] Feat. Align. by Uncertainty and Self-Training for SFUDA (2022)
item.description: 2208.14888 Feature Alignment by Uncertainty and Self-Training for Source-Free Unsupervised Domain Adaptation (2022) 概述 本文提出一种 source-free UDA 方法，称为 Feature Alignment by Uncertainty and Self-Training (FAUST)。 模型架构
